NPC_PRISONER_A_MSG_070: ̂Lucia was in the next cell over. I haven't heard her make a sound in a while... I fear the worst has happened...
NPC_PRISONER_D_MSG_110:
́If there was ever a time to escape this place, this is it.
There's no way I can blow this chance.
NPC_PRISONER_B_MSG_070: ́Hey, you there! Help me! Get me the heck outta here! C'mon!
NPC_PRISONER_B_MSG_080:
́I overheard the guards talking about how Itaburu is after a Resistance member who's on the loose in here.
ā
Are you the one they're after? If you stay here, he's going to find you.
ā
There's a hall on the 5th floor that they barely use. I think you might want make your way up there.
NPC_PRISONER_B_MSG_110: ́You're... letting me out... for real? You're not joking, right?
NPC_PRISONER_C_MSG_070:
̃I wonder how my son is doing... I've given up hope for just about everything at this point, except his safety...
ā
That's about the only thing keepin' me from dying an unhappy death, here in this cell block...
SYSTEM_MSG_006:
There's a hole here that you can likely squeeze through.
Would you like to crawl through it?Ă
NPC_PRISONER_C_MSG_080:
̃What is up with those violent monsters?
ā
Son.... this is it. I don't think you'll be able to return alive.
NPC_PRISONER_C_MSG_110:
̃Thank you so much! I honestly can't believe that I'm free!
ā
I can finally see my little bundle of joy again! I absolutely can't wait to hold him once more!
NPC_PRISONER_D_MSG_070:
́Itaburu was just here, and then headed back out again.
ā
Something must be going on around here today... any idea what all the fuss is about?
NPC_PRISONER_D_MSG_080:
́You look like you're trying to run away from something. I don't know what you did, but you should hurry up and run.
ā
Don't worry. If anyone asks, I'll say that I didn't see anything.
ā
I despise them. So please, make them run around as much as you can.
NPC_JAILER_A_MSG_070:
́You're a fresh face? Are you an escaped convict!?
No... perhaps you're the new guard I was told about?Ă
NPC_JAILER_A_MSG_071:
́You aren't the brightest, are you! How in the heck did you get outta yer prison cell!?
ā
Tell ya what... if ya go back without makin' a fuss, I'll bring ya back without leavin' a mark on ya!
NPC_JAILER_A_MSG_072:
́Give it up! That Guard Badge
doesn't belong to you, does it?!
ā
Get back in your prison cell, pronto! You wouldn't like it if I had to force you back in there!
NPC_JAILER_A_MSG_073:
́Alright then, let's have a look at yer Guard Badge...
ā
A few of them Guard Badges have been lost as of late. This one looks legit, though...
ā
Still, I gotta make sure you're capable of the job first...
ā
Here's yer first task. Head on up to the 2nd floor an' make sure the machine's runnin' properly.
ā
Itaburu said a prisoner was on the loose, so I gotta make sure it ain't been sabotaged or nothin'...
NPC_JAILER_A_MSG_074:
́Here's yer first task. Head on up to the 2nd floor an'
make sure the machine's runnin' properly.
ā
Itaburu said a prisoner was on the loose, so I gotta
make sure it ain't been sabotaged or nothin'...
REC_RA_MONS_MES:
̄An Insurgent Demon transformed by Mother's
rampage. It has an frightening amount of power.
NPC_JAILER_A_MSG_080:
́Hmm... guess I was all worked up aboutnothing. However, this time, no news is good news.
ā
Anyhow, it's 'bout time for the staff meeting, Rookie. Line up 'long side everyone else!
NPC_JAILER_B_MSG_070:
́Hey, rookie! What're you doin', wandering off like that! 
Stop playing around an' get back to work!
ā
Itaburu's 'bout to stop by for the meeting! It's an important one today, so don't blow it!
NPC_JAILER_C_MSG_070:
́Hmm... you the new guard we been hearin' about?
Did you pick up your Guard Badge yet?Ă
NPC_JAILER_C_MSG_071:
́Well, you're gonna need one... here, take this. 
I'll loan ya my spare. Don't go losin' it, or anything.
REC_NPC_OOKIDUTI: ̄Minion of Itaburu, who is also one of the primary prison guards. Seems to be the most friendly of the bunch.
NPC_JAILER_C_MSG_072:
́Good, make sure you hold onto it. Without a Guard Badge, there's no proof you ain't just a prisoner on the run!
ā
Some guards are really strict about not having one, too.
If ya lose it, you can be in big trouble.
NPC_JAILER_C_MSG_073:
́Hey you, fresh meat. Lord Itaburu's big meeting is happenin' today.
ā
Quit playing around and go back to work. If he sees you screwin' around, you'll be dead meat!
NPC_JAILER_D_MSG_070:
̂Sigh... once again, Itaburu has assigned me overtime
duties guardin' the cell block...
ā
He found a bomb rigged up on the 2nd floor. So he's got me keepin' watch for the rat that planted it.
ā
Could've been anyone though... why's it always gotta be me doin' all the dirty work?
REACTER_MSG_000:
̄Overly hostile monsters have been detected near by.
Hide from them, and avoid confrontation for now.
ā
I've located an area on the 5th floor with low monster activity. You should seek this area out immediately.
ā
Move fast, be stealthy, and most of all... stay safe!
NPC_RUKIYA_MSG_110:
̃It looks like you succeeded in releasing all of the
prisoners. It is time to execute our plan, then.
ā
Hurry back to the power room, on the 4th floor!
NPC_RUKIYA_MSG_120:
̃Now we need to hurry up and destroy that
Break Monster Remodeling Device!
ā
It's located up on the 3rd floor. I'll meet you up there.
REC_NPC_GAIKOTU: ̄Minion of Itaburu, who is also one of the primary prison guards. Seems to not be "all with it".
NPC_RUKIYA_MSG_121:
̃I'm glad you're back safely. As you can see, I'm safe as well.
ā
Alright, we have no time to lose! Let's go destroy that machine again!
NPC_RUKIYA_MSG_122:
̃Alright! We don't have much time! Please defeat Itaburu this time!
ā
Same place as before. Go towards the power supply on the 3rd floor!
SYSTEM_MSG_000:
There looks to be plenty of drinking water here.
Would you like to take a scoop of water?Ă
SYSTEM_MSG_001: You cupped your palm and scooped up some water to drink.
SYSTEM_MSG_002: The remains of an empty disguise are lying here on the ground.
SYSTEM_MSG_003:
The lock on this prison cell has been disabled.
Would you like to quietly slip through the bars?Ă
SYSTEM_MSG_003_2:
The lock on this prison cell has been disabled.
Would you like to quietly slip through the bars?Ă
SYSTEM_MSG_997: Would you like to rest in the bed?Ă
SYSTEM_MSG_997_2: The bed can be used to rest.Ĉ
SYSTEM_MSG_997_3: Decided not to use the bed.
SYSTEM_MSG_998: There seems to be an electronic device keeping the cell doors magnetically locked.
SYSTEM_MSG_999:
You used the Prison Key
to unlock the electronic lock!
SYSTEM_MSG_996:
It's the Guard Elevator.
However, it appears to be inoperable at the moment.
SYSTEM_MSG_995:
The elevator is back online.
Use it to reach the next floor?Ă
REC_NPC_SAMAYOUYOROI: ̄Minion of Itaburu, who is also one of the primary prison guards. It is the head guard at this prison.
REC_NPC_SLYMKNAIGHT: ̄Minion of Itaburu, who is also one of the primary prison guards. A very strict follower and rule enforcer.
REC_NPC_PRIZONER: ̄Former residents of Alloy Park that have been captured and imprisoned by Itaburu.
REC_NPC_RUKIYA:
̄An elderly woman who once led the Resistance.
Still a very intelligent woman, and an active leader to this day.
REC_POINT_01_2: ̄This elevator can reach the top floor.
